oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Diploma from the Medical University of South Carolina
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Dr. R. Y. Rudicil graduated from the the Medical University of South Carolina in 1852. The diploma is written entirely in Latin. The Medical University of South Carolina was founded in 1825. Dr. Rudicil served as the surgeon of the 6th Georgia Cav., CSA. The 6th fought at Chickamauga and in the Knoxville Campaigns in 1863, in the Atlanta Campaign and March to the Sea in 1864, and through the Carolinas in 1865. Dr. Rudicil was with his unit at the surrender in North Carolina April 26, 1865.
